pym.libxl module¶

pym.libxl.cell_to_packed_rowcol(cell)¶

pack row and column into the required 4 byte format

pym.libxl.cell_to_rowcol(cell)¶

Convert an Excel cell reference string in A1 notation to numeric row/col notation.

Returns: row, col, row_abs, col_abs

pym.libxl.cell_to_rowcol2(cell)¶

Convert an Excel cell reference string in A1 notation to numeric row/col notation.

Returns: row, col

pym.libxl.cellrange_to_rowcol_pair(cellrange)¶

Convert cell range string in A1 notation to numeric row/col pair.

Returns: row1, col1, row2, col2

pym.libxl.col_by_name(colname)¶

‘A’ -> 0, ‘Z’ -> 25, ‘AA’ -> 26, etc

pym.libxl.quote_sheet_name(unquoted_sheet_name)¶
pym.libxl.rowcol_pair_to_cellrange(row1, col1, row2, col2, row1_abs=False, col1_abs=False, row2_abs=False, col2_abs=False)¶

Convert two (row,column) pairs into a cell range string in A1:B2 notation.

Returns: cell range string

pym.libxl.rowcol_to_cell(row, col, row_abs=False, col_abs=False)¶

Convert numeric row/col notation to an Excel cell reference string in A1 notation.

pym.libxl.valid_sheet_name(sheet_name)¶
